comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: New York State highway commissioner, district attorney from Cortland NY.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Cortland D.A. was sometimes spelled "Duffey."

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Feb 7, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F7061FFE395B1773... says that the new governor, Whitman, had "re-organized" the State Highway Deparment, and appointed Edwin Duffey of Cortland as Commissioner.
